phrases: It is just my imagination, right?
Let us go to a party!
Apparently there will be a tea party with guys from a band.
Well, they are actually just boys from Yumezaki High.
They are pretty famous in the Indie crowd.
They said that I should bring some friends with me.
Apparently Sakura-san is in love with the group's vocalist.
So I wanted to introduce him to you, too.
Are you sure I can come?
You still have not gone home, Prez?
Should not student council be over now?
Yeah, but I have to do something.
I am trying to open up a day next week, so I am trying to finish some work in advance.
Sakura wants me to come with her after school.
They are some kind of band.
No, this should be over here.
Is the band a male group?
So they are people you do not know.
I cannot get these done otherwise.
So, what will you all do?
Probably just chat at a cafe or something.
You look like you have something you want to say.
Just thinking how rare it is for you to take part in that kind of activity.
Middle school was probably the last time I hung out with friends after school.
Maybe that is why I am looking forward to this.
You should listen to it before the tea party.
It is a really happy and touching song.
You listened to their songs, Shizuko?
I think that depends on the person's taste.
I have not seen many these days.
Sending in over the web is becoming more common.
What do you win from this magazine's mail in prize?
Is not this supposed to be a music magazine?
Well, it does not have to be king crab that I win.
They are really popular in the Indie scene right now.
But then, I only learned about them recently.
I am thinking of having a visual band day here.
I have not seen them around in a while.
I hope they are being studious at home.
That you would come to Sakura-san's tea party.
Rock music is a world totally opposite from yours.
You know, seeing such a happy Sakura, I wanted to cheer her on.
I hope it will go well.
Soon, our dream will come true.
Maid Latte, full day feast, enjoy the full menu!
We will pile up the points and challenge Misa-chan to a game!
We will not lose this time!
The only thing we are going for is a picture with Misa-chan!
Alright, time to get to work.
Shiroyan, you better not break plates today.
Do not make any wrong orders.
That is the 6th time you have asked that question today.
Misaki, Shizuko's giving me the cold shoulder.
Okay, I will go get the order.
No, I should be the one.
No, you make too many mistakes!
So he is the one Sakura likes.
Time for us to introduce ourselves.
I am Shou, on the guitar.
I am Kou, playing the bass.
I am William Adam Yuji, drums.
I have never met people like them before.
Here is a present for you.
It is the poster you were talking about the other day.
I cannot keep up with Sakura.
People are walking about like trash.
This really is not a dream, right?
How all of you are sitting in front of me!
I am so glad I became your fan!
I love all of you so much.
When Kuuga-kun called out to me, I was so happy, I thought my heart would stop.
It is not a big deal if I cannot follow her.
I am so happy that she is, that I want to root for her.
She brought along only two friends.
We should not have brought 20 tickets.
Let us stop this menial fan service already.
We are getting enough of an audience base.
Looks like she is totally fallen for you.
I like long straight hair, you know.
Maybe I will make her mine.
Yeah, what do you think, Misaki-chan?
I am sure it will be fun.
I do not have much free time.
It is hard to get these tickets, right, Kuuga-kun?
You think you can make it, Misaki-chan?
Well, I do not have the money to, anyways.
Yeah, I always see you at our concerts.
You are such a perfect fan.
I always hear her talking about Umemishi.
It feel that Kuuga keeps on talking to me.
How can I get him to face Sakura?
Well, I wanted to chat with you a bit.
Then we can do that at the table.
No, since they are having their own fun.
Do not you understand Sakura's feelings?
Yeah, but I have no interest in her.
Then why did you ask Sakura out?
She seems pretty serious about him, so I am sure she will catch the hint with this.
I cannot deal with every girl, so I got to reject her sooner than later.
I am being considerate to my fans.
If it is early on, it will not hurt too much, right?
But then, if you became our fan, I might change my mind.
I am sorry for the wait.
Is he someone you know, Misaki-chan?
We need to call another waiter here.
He is a stalker, but not really.
He is um... how do I say...
I am a stalker but not, so what am I?
What are you doing here, anyways?!
When did you start working here?
I happened to run across a person I know.
Then I felt like ripping the clothes off of him.
I think you are really messed up.
There are times when I feel annoyed, too.
But, just because you are annoyed...
I cannot overlook things like that.
It is none of your business.
And do not get me wrong.
I am here because of Sakura...
So I wanted to introduce him to you, too.
Sakura was really looking forward to today.
Look at that face of yours, Ayuzawa.
What am I supposed to do?
I am not familiar with things like these.
I just do not know the best way to handle this.
I do not think anyone knows that.
What is up with him, damn it!
You will be singing a new song in the next live, right?
I am really looking forward to it.
What kind of song is it?
I should not be asking this, right?
You think you can do anything about this?
You are close friends with her, right?
Then bring her to our concert.
She is the Student Council President, too.
She is cute, stylish, and the Student Council President as well.
You think it would help if her best friend Sakura-chan begged her?
You think you can come to the concert with me?
I will help out with your work at the student council, so...
You see, Kuuga-kun really wants you to come.
While you were gone, we kept talking about you.
I heard you are the Student Council President, Misaki-chan.
Someone who works hard and diligently needs a break.
If you cannot come to the concert, how about we go to an amusement park?
You are the type that appears diligent but is actually a party animal, right?
I wonder if smart girls become good taking care of guys, too.
Was that guy someone you like to party with, too?
You two really had to put on a show there.
Oh, I do not hear an excuse, so did I hit the jackpot?
I never knew that Seika's President was a party animal.
Do not talk about Misaki like that!
I always tell you to take better care of your fans.
Things like that make me sick.
This is your way of being considerate?
I have never seen such a horrible sense of consideration.
Sakura was looking forward to this day so much.
And to trample on her feelings like this...
Do you dislike me now, too, Misaki-chan?
I will never let you have Sakura!
No, I will yell at you!
What do you think you were doing, yelling so loudly in a cafe!
Even if you were angry, think of the trouble you caused to the people around us!
Did you forget what I told you before?
I told you that you are easily tricked, so you should choose men more carefully!
Develop a better eye for men then!
I have never seen such a wild Shizuko before.
I sat through such a stressful environment.
I was at my limits, too.
Shizuko is not kind at all!
Because I know you will not learn if I am nice to you!
Shizuko, let her off the hook now, yeah?
Next time, I will choose someone who will pat my head like this.
I hope Sakura will find a good person soon.
Choose someone who will pat my head, eh?
You took your sweet time, Prez.
Is something wrong with your head?
Do not let it bother you.
Since I am a stalker, maybe I will follow you to your home.
Do not I always tell you to grow up a little?
Kou-chan, you sound like my dad.
Would you please depart already, Masters?!
You will come with me to the next Umemishi live, right?
Sakura-san, you still have not learned?
If it is not interesting again, I will leave at once, okay?
So you will go with me?
We wanted to try the preview, but it is harder than I thought.
We were waiting for you to show up.
So Misaki, would you go to the next Umemishi-
We will talk about that later.
Hey, Usui-san is glancing over at us.
It looks like he wants attention.
I feel like it will be more trouble.
